name: Mushroom ensemble
description:
This game is farm of mushrooms. There are 6 types of it: Sigma, Alpha, Omega, Gamma, Beta-male and Beta-female. They have 2 characteristics: Prov and Pref. the first characteristic is responsible for the costs of currency production and for deducting from the currency, the second - for earning currency and for adding it. 

All mushrooms can interact with other types of mushrooms. For example, if Omega near  Gamma, both of it receiving Pref +30%.

There all mushrooms and its characteristic:

SIgma - Perf=2, Prov=1, Cost=5;

Alpha - Perf=0, Prov=2, Cost=10;

Omega - Perf=6, Prov=3, Cost=12;

Gamma - Perf=0, Prov=3, Cost=40;

Beta-male - Perf=0, Prov=3, Cost=36;

Beta-female - Perf=10, Prov=5, Cost=25.

During the game, you need to determine for yourself which types of mushrooms affect each other how.

How to play:

1) Tap on one of 25 cells. (you can cancel if you choose wrong cell).

2)Tap on type of mushroom.

3)Create a strategy that will lead you to victory.

If you earn 1000 V, you won. If you have negative V (below 0), you lost.

In the start of game you have 500 V.

Enjoy the game!
